concept.title: 5315.404-70-90 DD Form 1547, Record of Weighted Guidelines Method Application, Report Control Symbol: DD-AT&L(Q)1751

conbody.p: HQ AFMC/PK is the designated Department of the Air Force focal point for weighted guidelines reporting. DD Form 1547s shall be prepared and reported using the web-based Weighted Guidelines (WGL) Application. The SCO shall appoint a WGL Administrator at each geographic location. The responsibilities of the WGL Administrator are outlined in the WGL Administratorâ€™s Guide. Refer to the web-enabled version of the Profit WGL Application and User Application Guides (Users and Administrators).
